Name: Win The Diamond
About the game: Win The Diamond is a side scroller shooter game. Where, there is a Diamond hidden some where in the Level. The player needs to find the Diamond and collect it in order to win the Diamond. But collecting it will not be an easy task. As there will be plenty of obstacles and lot of people to defeat. The Player needs to defeat all the people who are protecting the Diamond, and over come all the obstacles and should win all the levels to win the diamond. It is a fun and interesting game if you are a fan of action adventure shooting games.
